text: João Clemente da Silva (born October 1905, date of death unknown) was a Brazilian long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1932 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1932 Summer Olympics Category:Brazilian male long-distance runners Category:Brazilian male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Brazil Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro (city)
title: João Clemente da Silva
